title: Arancini Margherita
description: Tomato & mozzarella risotto balls with arrabbiata sauce

title: Bruschetta Al Pomodoro
description: Chopped tomatoes, oregano, extra virgin olive oil, garlic and basil

title: Insalata Caprese
description: Sicilian organic datterini tomatoes with buffalo mozzarella D.O.P from Campania, with fresh basil, oregano & extra virgin olive oil

title: Crostone Di Camponia
description: Fried bread topped with traditional Sicilian vegetables with balsamic vinegar, fresh mint, peanuts & Caciocavallo cheese

title: Italian Cheese Board
description: Finest selection of Italian DOP cheeses served with figs, jam and bread

title: Acqua Pazza
description: Pan-fried fillets of fish with olives, garlic, white wine, capers, parsley & the sweetest baby plum tomatoes.

title: Spaghetti Allo Scoglio
description: Spaghetti with seafood (squid, clams, mussels, prawns) in white wine sauce with cherry tomatoes, chilli, garlic and parsley

title: Pollo Ai Funghi
description: Pan fried chicken breast with wild mushrooms in a creamy sauce, served with roast potatoes

title: Rigatoni Salsiccia e Broccoli
description: Pasta with fresh Italian sausage, broccoli, sundried tomatoes, black olives, garlic and stuffed with breadcrumbs

title: Tagliatelle Al Ragout
description: Tagliatelle pasta topped with homemade slow cooked shin beef ragout and Parmesan sauce

title: Rib Eye Steak
description: Premium Irish rib eye steak served with a spicy Italian style sauce and Patate al forno

title: Tagliatelle Trento
description: Speck meat, wild mushrooms with a hint of truffle and extra virgin olive oil

title: Tiramisu
description: A popular coffee-flavoured Italian custard dessert. It is made of ladyfingers dipped in coffee, layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar, and mascarpone cheese, flavoured with cocoa.  Eggs, Mascarpone cheese, coffee, liqueur, cocoa.

title: Creamy panna cotta
description: Vanilla panna cotta with a seasonal fruit compote.

title: Amalfi lemon meringue cheesecake
description: Velvety mascarpone & lemon cheesecake topped with Italian meringue, served with lemon curd & blackcurrants.

title: Cannoli Siciliani
description: Pastry tubes filled with sweet buffalo Ricotta cheese and pistachio.

title: Zabaglione Italiano
description: An Italian dessert made with egg yolks, sugar, and a sweet wine (usually Moscato d'Asti or Marsala wine).

title: Gelato Italiano
description: Frozen Italian ice cream with refreshing flavours, choose from strawberry, pistachio, chocolate, summer berries and vanilla which are served in a chocolate bowl.
